translated: Shrimp is a crustacean from the order of decapods (Decapoda), which also includes crabs, crayfish, lobsters, lobsters and squat lobsters.
original: La crevette est un crustacé, de l'ordre des décapodes (Decapoda), qui comprend aussi les crabes, écrevisses, homards, langoustes et galathées.
